intro: Impatiens langeana, commonly known as the Langean impatiens, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. It belongs to the family Balsaminaceae and is characterized by its delicate, showy flowers that come in shades of pink, red, and white. The plant typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, reaching heights of up to 30 centimeters. Its leaves are ovate and slightly hairy, while its stems are slender and often branched. Impatiens langeana thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
